summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Five Hundred Four Thousand, Nine Hundred Eleven and 33/100 Dollars ($504,911.33) to pay the principal and interest at maturity, with exchange, on a temporary loan of Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($500,000) to meet the current general expenses of the City of Seattle as provided for in Resolution No. 4697, of the City of Seattle and directing the City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk to draw, and the City Treasurer to pay, a warrant upon the general fund threfor, and declaring an emergency.
